champ_0080_dragon_02:
You appear to be progressing well on your
Gym circuit.[npcn:12]
champ_0080_ground_01:
What’s this now? Is this that kid I’ve been hearing
so much about?[npcn:2C]
champ_0080_ground_02:
Hey, kiddo! I heard you’re, like, way too good
at battling! Yeah?[npcn:2C]
champ_0080_ground_03a: Nahaha! You got some spirit, big shot![npcn:2C]
champ_0080_ground_03b:
Pah! You can’t fool me that easily. No need to
play humble, you hear?[npcn:2C]
champ_0080_dragon_03: This young lady would be Rika.[npcn:12]
champ_0080_ground_04: That’s me! Rika here, at your service.[npcn:13]
champ_0080_ground_05:
And hey, I know I’m pretty, but no need to get
intimidated or anything.[npcn:13]
champ_0080_dragon_04:
She is a little...farcical, shall we say. But like
myself, she is a member of the Elite Four.[npcn:12]
champ_0080_ground_06: What? I wasn’t tryin’ to be funny...[npcn:13]
champ_0080_ground_08:
Tell you something, kiddo—you look fun.
Like, interesting. At a glance, anyway.[npcn:13]
champ_0080_dragon_05:
Naturally. [H;Sh:g]e is one of our academy’s esteemed
students.[npcn:12]
champ_0080_ground_09: Oooh, haha. Yeah, that checks out.[npcn:13]
champ_0080_ground_10:
But the battles you’ll face at these Gyms really
ratchet up the farther you go.[npcn:13]
champ_0080_dragon_06:
Indeed. Your average Trainer abandons the
challenge at roughly this very point.[npcn:12]
champ_0080_ground_12:
See you when you hit the Champion Assessment.
You show these Gyms what you’ve got![npcn:13]
